notes.content: Project initialized with RAPID method. Existing codebase includes DDPM neural networks, data preprocessing, and training infrastructure for ocean current inpainting.

Problem clarification: Research project to predict ocean currents from sparse in-situ measurements. Treated as inpainting problem - given small sampling of point measurements, reconstruct the full 2D velocity vector field using DDPM.

Beta schedule fix: corrected base_inpaint.yaml from min_beta=0.0004/max_beta=0.08 to 0.0001/0.02. Old schedule destroyed all signal by t=166 (alpha_bar < 0.01), causing 2-7x magnitude blow-up in generated samples. RePaint+CG experiment retraining with corrected schedule.
